description: Assigns metadata to an AppConfig resource. Tags help organize and categorize your AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define. You can specify a maximum of 50 tags for a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource for which to retrieve tags.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The key-value string map. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z+-=._:/]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:. The tag value can be up to 256 characters. (string) --- (string) ---
